meanings.definition: The practice or work of a midwife.
meanings.sent1: She admired the midwiferies of the experienced midwife.
meanings.sent2: The midwiferies of the village midwife were well-known.
meanings.sent3: The midwiferies of the midwife saved the day in the birthing room.
meanings.sent4: Her gentle midwiferies guided new life into the world.
meanings.sent5: The midwiferies of the midwife brought comfort and joy to many families.

meanings.definition: The skills or techniques of a midwife.
meanings.sent1: Learning the midwiferies takes dedication and practice.
meanings.sent2: Her mastery of midwiferies helped many mothers during childbirth.
meanings.sent3: The midwiferies of the midwife were like magic in action.
meanings.sent4: Her precise midwiferies were a beacon of hope for expecting mothers.
meanings.sent5: The intricate midwiferies of the midwife were truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The services provided by a midwife.
meanings.sent1: The midwiferies offered by the midwife were invaluable to the community.
meanings.sent2: Many families relied on the midwiferies for safe deliveries.

meanings.sent4: Her compassionate midwiferies touched the lives of many families.
meanings.sent5: The essential midwiferies provided by the midwife were greatly appreciated.
